mapper.select: SELECT CLAS_ID, CLAS_TITLE, CLAS_LOCATION, CLAS_STATUS, CLAS_HUIMANG_INWON, CLAS_HYEONJAE_INWON FROM ( SELECT CLAS_ID, CLAS_TITLE, CLAS_LOCATION, CLAS_STATUS, CLAS_HUIMANG_INWON, CLAS_HYEONJAE_INWON, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CLAS_ID DESC) AS RN FROM CLASS c ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMTD.CLASS (CLAS_ID, CLAS_TITLE, CLAS_LOCATION, CLAS_STATUS, CLAS_MAGAM_GIHAN, CLAS_HUIMANG_INWON, CLAS_SUEOP_NALJJA, CLAS_CHOISO_SUGANGNYO, CLAS_CHOIDAE_SUGANGNYO, CLAS_SEONGBYEOL_JEHAN, CLAS_NAI_JEHAN, CLAS_SUBJECT_JEONGBO, CLAS_CONTENT) VALUES(CLAS_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{clasTitle}, #{clasLocation}, #{clasStatus} , TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1' MONTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{clasHuimangInwon}, #{clasSueopNaljja}, #{clasChoisoSugangnyo}, #{clasChoidaeSugangnyo}, #{clasSeongbyeolJehan}, #{clasNaiJehan}, #{clasSubjectJeongbo}, #{clasContent})
